content: Y-You're wearing the clothes as me today... {A害羞冒烟}Th-Thank you! <style=SizeSmall>I r-really wanna take a picture for keeps!</style>

content: Each crop will never be exactly the same each time you grow it, but if I could be a lickle bit, or even just a teensy bit more like you, I'd be so happy.
